com.aylanetworks.agilelink.util

类 PasswordCrypt

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aylanetworks.agilelink.util.PasswordCrypt

  • public class PasswordCrypt
extends java.lang.Object
    PasswordCrypt class is used to encrypt user password and save it in the Shared Preference. The key used for encrypting is saved in the Android KeyStore so it is pretty secure. When encryptAndSave method of this class is called if Key and it does not exist we create a key and store in KeyStore and also create a random IV and save the IV to Shared Preference. When getClearPassword is called we get the encrypted password from the SharedPreference and use the key in the KeyStore to decrypt it. The IV for decryption is fetched from the Shared Preference. As KeyGenerator is available only for Android M or higher we can use this class only if the Android OS is Android M or higher. Since this class is used with Finger Print that needs Android M or higher the minimum requirement of Android M is not an issue.

    • 构造器详细资料

        public PasswordCrypt()

    • 方法详细资料

      • encryptAndSave

        public static boolean encryptAndSave(android.content.Context context,
                                     java.lang.String input)
        This method is used for encrypting and saving the password. The key used for encrypting is saved in the Android KeyStore. First check if IV exists is SharedPreference else Create a key and also Generate RandomIV.
        参数:
        context - Context used encrypt and save password
        input - clear password
        返回:
        true if success

      • getClearPassword

        public static java.lang.String getClearPassword(android.content.Context context)
        Get clear password from the encrypted password stored in Shared Preference. We use decrypt method to decrypt the password.
        参数:
        context - Context used to get the Password
        返回:
        clear password on success
